We design it. We build it. You love it.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/portfolio/” button_text=”See our work” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_button=”on” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover=”#d3d3d3″ button_bg_enable_color__hover=”on”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”off|on|on” admin_label=”Mobile CTA” module_id=”mobile-cta” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_padding=”3px||3px||true|” border_width_all=”2px” border_color_all=”#60cae4″][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_4,1_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″]

Let’s get to know each other better! Tell us what you’d like to see in your home.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_button button_url=”/contact” button_text=”Get in touch” _builder_version=”3.29.3″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”on|on|off” admin_label=”About” _builder_version=”3.23.3″ width=”100%”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.23.3″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_font=”Fira Sans|300|||||||”]

Great Designs. Better service.

There’s not another design-build remodeler in Portland as focused on your overall satisfaction as we are. You don’t have to worry or stress. Just be yourself and let us handle everything!

What’s your project? What’s your timeline? What’s your budget?

Your answers to these questions will tell us a lot about whether we’re a good fit to work together. We’re upfront and honest, so if we don’t think our experience and expertise will make your project better, we’ll tell you.

But if we’re as inspired by your home and your ideas as you are, we’ll tell you that, too!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/contact/” button_text=”Say hello!” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_margin=”||45px|||”][/et_pb_button][et_pb_text disabled_on=”on|off|off” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_font=”Fira Sans|300|||||||” custom_padding=”|||0px||”]

Design-build isn’t remodeling… it’s even better!

You don’t have to worry about designers creating impractical plans or contractors cutting corners. Design-build is one seamless team working together. We treat your home the way we treat our own — with care. On-time and on-budget aren’t empty promises. Problems are solved before they start. We’re always just a phone call or text away. When the job is done, everything will be just how you imagined it — down to the smallest detail

That’s design-build.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.23.3″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://mosaikdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/Mosiak_DesignBuildGraphic-01.png” disabled_on=”on|on|off” _builder_version=”3.23.3″ custom_margin=”60px|||||”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_padding=”60px|||||”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_padding=”|23px||||”]

Everything you need, inside and out, start to finish. Mosaik is your one-stop shop for any home remodeling project.

 

  • Design

  • Build

  • Interior Design

  • Landscaping

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_font=”Fira Sans|300|||||||”]

Beyond the numbers

The Mosaik design-build team has almost 50 years of combined experience, has won numerous awards, and our work has been featured in dozens of magazines and newspapers. But numbers don’t tell the whole story. Numbers don’t show how much we care about each and every project. Just take a look at our process and you’ll see our commitment.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/design-build-process/” button_text=”Our Process” _builder_version=”3.29.3″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”off|off|on” admin_label=”About” _builder_version=”3.23.3″ width=”100%” custom_padding=”||4px|||”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.23.3″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_font=”Fira Sans|300|||||||”]

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Testimonials and Awards” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ background_image=”https://mosaikdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/Home-Awards-Portland-Mosaik.jpg” custom_margin=”30px|||||” custom_padding=”30px|0px|0px|||” z_index_tablet=”500″ box_shadow_horizontal_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_vertical_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_tablet=”0px” global_module=”8685″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ disabled_on=”on|on|off” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ background_image=”https://mosaikdesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/Home-Awards-Portland-Mosaik.jpg” background_repeat=”repeat-y” background_blend=”soft-light” width=”100%” max_width=”100%”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”home-left-column” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ custom_padding=”|0px||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_slider arrows_custom_color=”#000000″ dot_nav_custom_color=”#000000″ module_class=”home-quote-container” _builder_version=”4.3.2″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ body_font=”Playfair Display|600|||||||” body_text_color=”#000000″ background_color=”#ffffff” width=”80%” width_tablet=”80%” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”10%|20%|10%|20%|true|true” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”|||5%” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop”][et_pb_slide _builder_version=”3.29.3″ sticky_transition=”on”]A Mosaik Design and Remodeling truly sets the high standard when it comes to home design and remodel. Their work is impeccable and their attention to detail is uncompromised. They managed our project as if it was in their own home and we could not be happier.

– KAREN D[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide _builder_version=”3.29.3″ sticky_transition=”on”]

Having a complementary skills of both a designer and a builder/project manager has taken away most of the stress normally associated with remodeling. The project has consistently been on time and on budget. The attention to detail has been exacting, and the craftsmen that Mosaik has brought in to work on the project have been of equally high quality.

– TAMMY V.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide _builder_version=”3.29.3″ sticky_transition=”on”]

Erin and Scott are true professionals and a delight to work with. Erin came up with a plan that was both elegant and different from all the other ideas that we’d gathered. Scott takes great pride in both the work that is produced, onsite, and in his schedule. Both Scott and Erin are attentive, always available to help with any questions and bring great ideas and great energy.

– ILENE S.

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide _builder_version=”3.29.3″ sticky_transition=”on”]

Erin brought in some excellent ideas and Scott was ultra-attentive to the construction details, only the best quality materials and truly professional subs were used. Everything was built with safety and durability in mind. There are faster/cheaper options out there, but we are happy that we chose Erin and Scott for their quality work.

– ANTON C.

excerpt.rendered: We design it. We build it. You love it.Let’s get to know each other better! Tell us what you’d like to see in your home.Great Designs. Better service. There’s not another design-build remodeler in Portland as focused on your overall satisfaction as we are. You don’t have to worry or stress. Just be yourself and […]
